title: Bernie: Slate's Spoiler Special
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and Seth Stevenson discuss Richard Linklater's Bernie. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
